programme.title: 2002: This is an Asian Odyssey

programme.title: UFOs | Mysteries of Football
programme.desc: Is there any relation between UFOs and football? There have been many games in that past where strange sightings have taken place, but the real question is why?

programme.title: Curses | Mysteries of Football
programme.desc: Can a football team truly be cursed? In the third episode of the series, Diego Ripoll explores some of the curses suffered by important teams around the world.

programme.title: Phantoms | Mysteries of Football
programme.desc: Do ghosts like football and is that's why they appeared in several matches? Mysteries investigates this incredible phenomenon.

programme.title: Maradona: His Legacy
programme.desc: All the legendary moments of Diego Armando Maradona's illustrious career.

programme.title: Heroes and Babies | The Long Walk
programme.desc: The first episode of the series traces the history of the penalty shootout from its first appearance at the World Cup in 1982 up to the 1990 tournament.

programme.title: Pressure and Process | The Long Walk
programme.desc: The second episode of the series examines more penalty dramas. It begins with the 1994 Men's World Cup in USA and end with a dramatic triumph for the country's women in the 1999 final.

programme.title: Trauma and Redemption | The Long Walk
programme.desc: The third and final episode of The Long Walk moves the shootout into a new millennium. England's curse was alive and well in 2006 but the three lions would finally find redemption 12 years later.
